Class Floor

java.lang.Object
  greenfoot.Actor
      Floor

public class Floor
extends greenfoot.Actor

Lift simulation: Floor Setup: Sets a floor with PopUp-Counter and two buttons Act: Creates a person at Clicktarget on this floor

Version:
  • V0.4 18.12.2017 old Version,
  • V0.5 21.08.2017 Refactoring
    • Author:
    KEL

    Constructor Detail

    Floor

    public Floor(int floorNumber)
    This constructor sets a floor number and makes an array of the people on the elevator.

    Method Detail

    act

    public void act()
    Do the regular simulation action. For a floor, that is: produce a new person on every click.

    Overrides:
    act in class greenfoot.Actor

    public void clearButton(int direction)
    Reset a button.

    Parameters:
    direction - is either UP or DOWN

    enter

    public int enter(Person p)
    Enters this floor's from lift.

    Parameters:
    p - Person who enters the floor leaving lift
    Returns:
    int new floor-position
    See Also:
    Person.leaveLift(Floor)

    getButtons

    public int getButtons()
    Gets the status of the buttons

    Returns:
    int UP, DOWN or UP_DOWN if both are pressed, NONE if none is pressed

    Return this floor's number.

    pushButton

    public void pushButton(int direction)
    Press a button to call a lift to this floor. (see act() in Buttons)
